Posts.Content: Dec 12, 2008 02:00PM 30louise wrote: Hey I am in the same boat as swm63. I had my lumpectomy 4 weeks ago and met with my Dr last week to get my results (Stage 1, grade 3). He refered me to an Oncologist, but I still have not heard from them. (Despite leaving messages)  I am told I will be having chemo, then radiation.  I feel anxious to start my treatments. With Christmas coming, I am not even sure I will see the Oncologist before January.   Anyone know if there is a window to start chemo when it is most useful?
Posts.Title: when should treatment start? swm63 30louise
